sentence: I think it will happen.” There Could Be Another Major Buffalo Homecoming If the Bills Sign Ryan Fitzpatrick Buffalo Bills quarterback Ryan Fitzpatrick on the field during a game against the New York Jets.
author: Emily Bicks
title: Bills’ Former First-Round Pick Begs on Twitter to Return to Buffalo

sentence: Names such as Marcus Mariota and Ryan Fitzpatrick have been linked to the Bills as possible replacements, but no movement has been made to lock anyone in.
author: Emily Bicks
title: Ex-Bills QB Hints He’s Returning to Buffalo With Viral Tweet & IG Post

sentence: #GoBills #BillsMafia #Fitzmagic #Bills pic.twitter.com/0ZA7ICyTT8 — Lance Valcour (@Lance_Valcour) March 17, 2022 Ryan Fitzpatrick has to be the Bills backup QB if they want to win the Super Bowl, don’t ask me why, it’s to mathematical for me to explain maybe some fitzmagic next season #BillsMafia https://t.co/Wtu9eNeN4g pic.twitter.com/7EIICD9Se1 — Jenna Cottrell (@JennaCottrell) March 19, 2022 However, with Keenum signing with Buffalo, and Bakley’s contract seemingly just around the corner, it seems Fitzpatrick is officially out of the running.
author: Emily Bicks
title: Bills Trade With Cleveland Browns to Land New Backup QB: Report
